column1: Often called Cyber security or Information Security, in this Masters degree in Advanced Computer Security you will explore the technologies and practices designed to protect sensitive data, computers and networks from both intentional and accidental access, alterations and damage by diverse threat actors.
FeesAs a postgraduate, research or part-time student, the tuition fees you are charged will depend on the course you choose to study.
1 year full time, 2 years part time
